name: akeyless-client-commons
description: Shared React/TypeScript component and utility library for Akeyless web applications â€” including UI components (shadcn/Radix), form builders, data tables, Firebase integration, real-time hooks, Excel export, and theming.
story: akeyless-client-commons is a comprehensive shared library for Akeyless web applications. It provides a curated set of React components built with shadcn/ui and Radix UI, form utilities with validation, interactive data tables, Firebase authentication and real-time database integration, custom React hooks for data management, Excel export functionality, and a collection of SVG icon assets. The library is designed to promote code reuse and consistency across multiple Akeyless applications.
